name: Crime Gangster Shooter
description:
Eliminate the terrorists that dive into your country. And confront the terrorist forces. With the help of special forces, use your fighting skills, destroy all enemies, and conquer the enemy's base, save the trapped civilians.

Crime Gangster Shooter Features:
- great military action FPS game
- a variety of powerful weapons
- High quality graphics
- Real music and sound effects
- realistic city environment
- Simple mode of operation
